title: AT101ET
author: AT101ET
created_time: February 04, 2023, 11:10:18 PMLast edit: June 25, 2023, 08:17:23 AM by AT101ET
content: Hey, Looking to sell a couple of hard to come by OG collectibles.Available (for the right price/trade) are the following;Peeled Recalescence 1,000mBTC Silver Sparrow. Coin comes with hologram, key and original CoA. More info: https://www.cryptonumist.com/coin/recalescence-coins-1000mbtc-silver-sparrow/PBC 1 BTC. Coin is peeled but comes with hologram still affixed. It is one of the original 62 funded coins.  More info: https://www.cryptonumist.com/coin/microsoul-pbc-coin/Both coins ship from the UK. Entertaining outright sale offers and trades.Thanks

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: Rough idea of cost on the silver one?

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: That pre-Microsoul PBC coin is a great part of early physical crypto historyDefinitely a good one to have in the collection.Good luck with your sale.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Cryptonumerist site is down - just as a heads up

comments.author: AT101ET
comments.created_time: April 16, 2023, 09:54:45 AMLast edit: April 16, 2023, 10:20:34 AM by AT101ET
comments.body: Coins are still available. More info: Recalescence Coins 1000mBTC Silver SparrowThis coin is fully loaded and never opened.Manuf. Recalescence CoinsYear 2013Denom. 1 BTCType PF, DIYMintage 500*Material .999 SilverDiameter 39 mmThickness 3 mmWeight 1 oztCountry Australia*Though a total of 500 were minted, under 200 received holograms and about 300 were sold as blanks. Many coins which were deemed unfit for sale were destroyed (and subsequently melted down) by Dustin.Microsoul PBCThe first coin produced by Matthew (gravitate) before the ‘Microsoul’ brandYear 2013Denom. 1 BTCMintage 100**Of the 100 minted, only 62 were funded and the remainder sold as blanks.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: The silver sparrow caught my attention before. ery unique and pretty looking coin.Links in OP don't seem to work, do you have any photos of the hologram side of the coin?

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Woa, thanks for the pics, MJ.These are some of the finer looking bitcoin collectibles I've seen so far. I guess there was no 0.1 or any other denomination version?

comments.author: AT101ET
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on April 16, 2023, 03:14:59 PMQuote from: Kryptowerk on April 16, 2023, 10:36:16 AMThe silver sparrow caught my attention before. ery unique and pretty looking coin.Links in OP don't seem to work, do you have any photos of the hologram side of the coin?Here is one from another userand they also came with COAsConfirming that the coin in OP comes with the corresponding CoA Quote from: Kryptowerk on April 17, 2023, 05:57:50 AMWoa, thanks for the pics, MJ.These are some of the finer looking bitcoin collectibles I've seen so far. I guess there was no 0.1 or any other denomination version?I believe that these were only released as 1 BTC versions. There were some gold plated versions, but also of the 1 BTC denomination.

comments.author: Bullion-n-BTC
comments.body: I’d be interested in a trade / buy on the silver sparrow if available

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Yeah that Recalescence coin ...silver sparrow has eluded my collection for many years.  Does anyone have any clue what these go for? Any recent auctions for reference?   I always loved the sparrow design as well as the security hologram it comes with as well.   Goodluck with your sale as always!

comments.author: Steeley
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on April 21, 2023, 07:53:50 PM Yeah that Recalescence coin ...silver sparrow has eluded my collection for many years.  Does anyone have any clue what these go for? Any recent auctions for reference?   I always loved the sparrow design as well as the security hologram it comes with as well.   Goodluck with your sale as always!I have tracked all public sales / auctions (not including Ebay) for the past 2.5 years for a project I am working on. I only see one sale for a redeemed & raw silver sparrow. It sold on 11/6/21 for .02 BTC.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: My bad, didn't realize these are peeled. In that case interested to buy the sparrow one if still available, or arrange a nice trade.Shoot me pm anytime @AT101ET otherwise will get back to you with an offer soon.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: Steeley on April 21, 2023, 09:35:45 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on April 21, 2023, 07:53:50 PM Yeah that Recalescence coin ...silver sparrow has eluded my collection for many years.  Does anyone have any clue what these go for? Any recent auctions for reference?   I always loved the sparrow design as well as the security hologram it comes with as well.   Goodluck with your sale as always!I have tracked all public sales / auctions (not including Ebay) for the past 2.5 years for a project I am working on. I only see one sale for a redeemed & raw silver sparrow. It sold on 11/6/21 for .02 BTC.    Thanks for the historical information on the Recalescence coin....that day Bitcoin traded between       Nov 06, 2021   61,543.2   60,093.6    So if traded at 61k x 0.02 = $1200   That's a nice sum of money for this coin...didnt realize they sell for that price at all.   Beyond my range here.
